org.cauli.server

类 BaseWebSocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cauli.server.BaseWebSocketHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    WebSocketHandler

    public class BaseWebSocketHandler
extends Object
implements WebSocketHandler
    Base implementation that does nothing, except for automatically calling WebSocketConnection.pong(byte[]) when onPing(org.cauli.server.WebSocketConnection, byte[]) receives a ping.

      • onClose

        public void onClose(WebSocketConnection connection)
             throws Exception
        从接口复制的说明: WebSocketHandler
        Called when a connection is closed.
        指定者:
        onClose 在接口中 WebSocketHandler
        参数:
        connection - the connection that was closed. Beware that the connection will be null if this handler is used in a WebSocket that fails to connect.
        抛出:
        Exception
